ValidationRule.description: Sync Status should not be changed to "Valid" or "Pending" if the Validation Status on the Address is not set to "Validated", so that Address info is not synced to NetSuite until Data Stewards performs the Validation
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Sync Status" cannot be set to "Valid" or "Pending" until Data Steward validates the Address and sets the "Validation Status" to "Validated"
